attributes.action: Reduce or nullify student debts for all students affected by the coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details:
It is a bad time to graduate. Experience from previous recessions tells us that graduates will be less likely to find work and will start off in lower-paying occupations than they might have expected [1]. Why then add the additional burden of debt? 


[1] https://www.ifs.org.uk/publications/14816
attributes.background:
Coronavirus has been catastrophic. Besides people dying prematurely or going stir crazy in lockdown, the economy is failing.

Why should graduates should suffer the additional baggage of a huge debt when they will be earning less than graduates of previous years?
